articles.title: Pair of former Red Sox saves Dodgers to force Game 7 of World Series
articles.description:
Mookie Betts broke out of his World Series slump, while Kiké Hernandez made a highlight play to seal the win.

The post Pair of former Red Sox saves Dodgers to force Game 7 of World Series appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Mookie Betts ended his World Series slump, contributing significantly to the Dodgers' win.
Kiké Hernandez made a crucial play, helping the Dodgers force a Game 7 on November 1.
Boston fans may feel mixed emotions as former Red Sox players impact the World Series.

articles.title: Frights and delights: A look at some of Boston’s stand-out Halloween costumes
articles.description:
Creepy, cute, and creative — here’s a roundup of some 2025 Halloween looks from around town.

The post Frights and delights: A look at some of Boston’s stand-out Halloween costumes appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Explore 2025's most creative Halloween costumes showcased by Boston residents.
Local favorites include unique designs from over 100 participants in various neighborhoods.
Increased community engagement boosts local businesses during the Halloween season.

articles.title: Federal judge rules Trump can’t require citizenship proof on the federal voting form
articles.description:
The ruling grants the plaintiffs a partial summary judgment that prohibits the proof-of-citizenship requirement from going into effect.

The post Federal judge rules Trump can’t require citizenship proof on the federal voting form appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Federal judge blocks Trump's citizenship proof requirement for voting forms.
Ruling grants plaintiffs partial summary judgment against the requirement.
Boston residents will face no additional barriers to voting in upcoming elections.
